user_query: I'm planning a trip with my friends and I want to send them a WhatsApp message to coordinate. Can you check the status of their phone numbers and provide me with the QR code for my phone? Also, can you suggest some good night messages for me to include in the message?

TaskList.description: Check the status of friends' phone numbers to ensure they are reachable on WhatsApp.
Generate a QR code for your WhatsApp to share your contact information with friends.
Generate a list of good night messages that can be sent to friends via WhatsApp.
Compose and send the WhatsApp message to friends including the QR code and good night messages.
